channel.title: My New Platebody (help with glitch)
channel.description:
I have created a new platebody (fused and recolored jagex models) as my first work. I added to the item file so it apeares in the right spot and also added models. I added sleeves drop and body seperatly after putting drop and full body didn't work for me. I need to know how to fix this animation glitch.
Please and thanks [img]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/9462/snedanddelte.jpg[/img] Feel free to ask for the model after I fix this it is part of a full set I edited and suped up!
[code]if(i == 14500) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14501; //Item Drop class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14500;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14500;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 14502;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 14502;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Supreme Platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Armour forged from the finest titalium.".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]

item.title: My New Platebody (help with glitch)
item.dc:creator: @savior savior
item.description:
@savior wrote:

Ok well thanks to roll (would rep you if I could) I have gotten a tut for it but I need to know how to select all on Metaseq.
Please this should be last question.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 08:36:12 pm[/size][hr]Ok found that out but now I cant find out were the weight button is…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 09:11:02 pm[/size][hr]ok found wgt just have to animate I will probobly have a problem with that…

Read full topic

item.title: My New Platebody (help with glitch)
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Wrong, you can’t add correct animation for platebody through datmaker, you have to do it in metaseq. PRI, VSKIN and TSKIN(1,2,3)

Theres a website somewhere explaining but i’ve forgot it, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: My New Platebody (help with glitch)

item.description:
@savior wrote:

I have created a new platebody (fused and recolored jagex models) as my first work. I added to the item file so it apeares in the right spot and also added models. I added sleeves drop and body seperatly after putting drop and full body didn’t work for me. I need to know how to fix this animation glitch.

Please and thanks

Feel free to ask for the model after I fix this it is part of a full set I edited and suped up!

if(i == 14500) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14501; //Item Drop class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14500;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14500;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 14502;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 14502;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Supreme Platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Armour forged from the finest titalium.".getBytes();//examin info }
